Subskills.name: Multistone Fragments
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of rock fragments.

Subskills.name: Stonegrowth
Subskills.description: Increases the size of rock fragments.

Subskills.name: Accumulating Density
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of rock fragments increasing damage dealt based on distance traveled.

Subskills.name: Reinforced Stone
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by rock fragments.

Subskills.name: Swift Fragments
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of rock fragments.

Subskills.name: Arcanastone
Subskills.description: Fragments have a chance of being imbued with arcana creating an arcane nova where they explode dealing damage over time.

Subskills.name: Fragment Growth
Subskills.description: Chance to conjure fragments with increased damage and size.

Subskills.name: Disorienting Impact
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to stun an enemy.

Subskills.name: Mad Rockslinger
Subskills.description: Throw increased amount of rocks in random directions.

Subskills.name: Feint Crush
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned enemies.

Subskills.name: Impaired Stone
Subskills.description: Rock fragments have a chance to ricochet on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Heavystone Crash
Subskills.description: Chance to deal a critical strike with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Elemental Fragments
Subskills.description: Arcanastone proc chance is doubled and additionally selects a random element between lightning, arcane, and fire. Lightning causes chain lightning, fire causes enemies to burn, and arcane leaves an arcane nova.

Subskills.name: Colossus Stone Fragment
Subskills.description: Throw a giant rock onto the target location that explodes into multiple rock fragments that explode into smaller fragments.
